code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{tasksAPI}from'../services/api';import TaskItem from'./TaskItem';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TaskList(){const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{tasksAPI.list().then(res=>{setTasks(res.data.tasks);}).catch(()=>{}).finally(()=>setLoading(false));},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading tasks..."});if(!tasks.length)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"No tasks yet."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:16},children:tasks.map(t=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskItem,{task:t,onChange:()=>window.location.reload()},t.id))});}
